channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Disney+ Hotstar、10月14日のICCクリケット・ワールドカップのインド-パキスタン戦を3,500万人が視聴し、ライブ同時視聴の世界最多ストリーミング記録を奪還（Manish Singh/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
Disney+ Hotstar reclaims the global streaming record for most live concurrent views with 35M watching the October 14 India-Pakistan ICC Cricket World Cup match  —  In India, few events garner as much attention as a cricket game.  A high-profile match between neighbors India and Pakistan delivered …

item.title: Xが記事リンクのある記事からプレビュー見出しを削除した場合、パブリッシャーはどのように対処しているのか。リンクを2回掲載したり、バックエンドのCMSを全面的に変更したり（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
How publishers are working around X dropping preview headlines from posts with article links, like posting the links twice or making full-on backend CMS changes  —  From posting the links twice to full-on back-end CMS changes, here's what we found.  —  The decision to strip headlines …

item.title: 英国のテレグラフ・グループに対する世界的な熱狂的な関心と7億5,000万ポンドという潜在的な売却額は、影響力のあるナショナル・タイトルが依然としてメディア王にとって魅力的であることを示している（Mark Sweney/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Mark Sweney / The Guardian:
The frenzied global interest and a potential sale value of ~£750M for UK's Telegraph Group shows influential national titles remain attractive to media barons  —  While falling sales suggest the demise of print, the industry has proved adaptable and remains attractive to media barons

item.title: イデオロギーの純粋性を求める保守系トークラジオとケーブルニュースのホストが、ケビン・マッカーシーの議長失脚を招いたエコシステムをいかにして作り上げたか（Brian Rosenwald/Politico）
item.description:
Brian Rosenwald / Politico:
How conservative talk radio and cable news hosts demanding more ideological purity created the ecosystem that precipitated Kevin McCarthy's downfall as Speaker  —  Talk radio and Fox News hosts created the political incentives that fueled Kevin McCarthy's ouster and today's speakership drama.

item.title: WGA、DGA、IATSE、チームスターズなどハリウッドの主要組合が、スタジオに対しSAG-AFTRAとの交渉再開を求める声明を発表（Katie Kilkenny/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Katie Kilkenny / The Hollywood Reporter:
Major Hollywood unions including the WGA, DGA, IATSE, and Teamsters issue a statement calling for studios to resume negotiations with SAG-AFTRA  —  “Each day a fair contract addressing actors' unique priorities is delayed is another day working professionals across our industry suffer unnecessarily …

item.title: 10月12日、テルアビブ警察がBBC記者に暴行を加え、銃口を突きつけた。BBC：ジャーナリストは「イスラエルとガザの紛争を自由に報道できなければならない」（BBC）
item.description:
BBC:
Tel Aviv police assaulted and held BBC journalists at gunpoint on October 12; BBC: journalists “must be able to report on the conflict in Israel-Gaza freely”  —  BBC journalists covering the attack on Israel were assaulted and held at gunpoint after they were stopped by police in the Israeli city of Tel Aviv.

item.title: 法輪功を支持する保守系非営利紙「エポック・タイムズ」が積極的なマーケティングで2年間で売上を685％増、2021年には1億2200万ドルに成長させた方法（Brandy Zadrozny/NBC News）
item.description:
Brandy Zadrozny / NBC News:
How The Epoch Times, the Falun Gong-backed conservative nonprofit newspaper, used aggressive marketing to grow revenue 685% in two years, to $122M in 2021  —  The conservative news outlet has amassed a fortune, growing its revenue by 685% in two years, according to tax documents.

item.title: 一部のメディアや政治家がミスリードや嘘を平気でつく中、報道機関も消費者もイスラエルとハマスの紛争における戦争の霧と格闘している（オリバー・ダーシー/CNN）。
item.description:
Oliver Darcy / CNN:
Newsrooms and consumers alike wrestle with the fog of war in the Israel-Hamas conflict, as some media and political figures are comfortable misleading or lying  —  The public is enveloped in the fog of war.  —  As the world's eyes remain fixated on the escalating conflict between Israel and Hamas …

item.title: コロンビア・ジャーナリズム・レビューのEIC兼発行人としての最後のコラムで、カイル・ポープは、聴衆の反応ではなく、聴衆に真実を伝えることに集中するよう促している（Kyle Pope/Columbia Journalism Review）。
item.description:
Kyle Pope / Columbia Journalism Review:
In his last column as Columbia Journalism Review's EIC and publisher, Kyle Pope urges focusing on telling the audience the truth and not the audience's response  —  Four years ago, CJR published a print magazine titled “How They See Us,” about the gap between how journalists are perceived by the world and how they see themselves.

item.title: イスラエル軍の砲弾がレバノン南部の国境での衝突を取材していたジャーナリストの間に着弾し、ロイターのフォトジャーナリスト、イッサム・アブダラが死亡、6人が負傷した（Hassan Ammar/Associated Press）。
item.description:
Hassan Ammar / Associated Press:
An Israeli shell landed among journalists covering the clashes on the border in south Lebanon, killing Reuters photojournalist Issam Abdallah and injuring six  —  An Israeli shell landed in a gathering of international journalists covering clashes on the border in south Lebanon, killing one and leaving six others injured.

item.title: TikTok、アプリのプレミアム広告商品「Pulse Premiere」のパブリッシャーとしてディズニーと契約、ディズニー動画、音楽、トリビアなどの専用コンテンツハブを追加（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
TikTok signs Disney as a publisher for the app's Pulse Premiere premium ad product and adds a dedicated content hub for Disney videos, music, trivia, and more  —  TikTok has landed Disney as its latest big-name publishing partner for its premium ad product, Pulse Premiere, announced earlier this year.

item.title: ニューヨーク・レビュー・オブ・ブックス』編集者エミリー・グリーンハウスとのQ&A：避けるべき言葉遣い、作家への配慮、新聞の使命、新人作家の歓迎などについて（『ニューヨーク・レビュー・オブ・ブックス』誌）
item.description:
The New York Review of Books:
Q&A with New York Review of Books' editor Emily Greenhouse on language to avoid, deferring to writers, the newspaper's mission, welcoming new writers, and more  —  Emily Greenhouse, interviewed by Daniel Drake … Emily Greenhouse is the Editor of The New York Review of Books.

item.title: 報道業界が苦境に立たされるなか、権力者の責任を追及する大学ジャーナリストたちによる調査やその他の影響力のある仕事を見てみよう（David Bauder/Associated Press）。
item.description:
David Bauder / Associated Press:
A look at the investigations and other high-impact work by college journalists, who are holding people in power accountable even as the news industry struggles  —  Within the past year, young journalists have produced investigations that led to the resignation of Stanford University's president …

item.title: 生放送でウクライナ戦争を非難した後、欧州に逃亡したロシア人ジャーナリスト、マリーナ・オフシアニコワの毒殺の疑いでフランス警察が捜査（AP通信）
item.description:
Associated Press:
French police investigate the suspected poisoning of Marina Ovsyannikova, the Russian journalist who fled to Europe after denouncing the Ukraine war on live TV  —  French prosecutors are investigating a suspected poisoning Thursday of a Russian journalist who fled after denouncing the war in Ukraine on live TV.

item.title: MailOnlineのソーシャル・ビデオ部門責任者フィル・ハーベイに、ニュース出版社のTikTok戦略についてインタビュー。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
An interview with MailOnline Head of Social Video Phil Harvey on the news publisher's TikTok strategy; the outlet's main TikTok account has 6.9M+ followers  —  Don't be surprised if you hear a member of Gen Z saying the Daily Mail “slays” on Tiktok or that it's gone “hard af” with its “fire edits”.
